## CredentialIssuanceMessage type

CredentialIssuanceMessage represent Iden3message for credential issuance

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type CredentialIssuanceMessage = {
    id: string;
    typ?: MediaType;
    type: ProtocolMessage;
    threadID?: string;
    body?: IssuanceMessageBody;
    from?: string;
    to?: string;
};
```
**References:** [MediaType](./polygonid-js-sdk.constants.mediatype.md), [ProtocolMessage](./polygonid-js-sdk.protocolmessage.md), [IssuanceMessageBody](./polygonid-js-sdk.issuancemessagebody.md)
